Dear authors,

Thank you for submitting to LoG! We are contacting you on behalf of the
programme chairs and organisers to collect your opinion about the
conference and the review process in a brief (~5 min) survey.

Please use the following link to access the survey:

  https://cispa.qualtrics.com/jfe/form/SV_4NtwjqA41bbuCkC

Please provide your feedback and help us improve future editions of LoG.
Your responses are treated anonymously, but you have the option to leave
personalised feedback in case you want to be contacted by us.

Thanks for your help---let's build a great community together!

Best,
  LoG Programme Chairs
